# Contributing to Sp3arParvus

First off, thank you for considering contributing to Sp3arParvus! It's people like you who make this project better for everyone.

## Code of Conduct

Help us keep this project open and inclusive by being respectful and helpful to others.

## How Can I Contribute?

### Reporting Bugs
- Use the [**Bug Report**](ISSUE_TEMPLATE\bug_report.md) template when opening an issue.
- Describe the steps to reproduce the issue.
- Mention which game you were playing and what executor you were using.

### Suggesting Enhancements
- Use the [**Feature Request**](ISSUE_TEMPLATE\feature_request.md) template.
- Explain why the feature would be useful.

### Pull Requests
- Fork the repository.
- Create a new branch for your feature or bug fix.
- Submit a PR with a clear description of the changes.

## Development

The project is written in Roblox Lua. Feel free to reach out if you have questions about the codebase!
